peeragogical-action-review.title: Wrap Working Group Progress PAR 2020-08-04
peeragogical-action-review.intention-review: We expect to improve the process for the monthly wraps and PARs and to make new ones!
peeragogical-action-review.what-happened: Catch up, discuss current state of thinking and how to proceed or go into some other direction.

html:ul.html:li: Stephan Kreutzer talked about many possible ideas that are available!
Charlie Danoff likes all the possible ideas that are available!
Overall we are pretty aligned on next steps and action to take forward

peeragogical-action-review.learnings-changes: We tried to formalize taking notes from this meeting and doing this PAR.

html:ul.html:li: Refreshing to get to meet again!
Maybe create GitHub issues to track action items or some other platform, so things are not forgotten
